title: Update Old Blog Post for SEO
description: An SEO specialist has identified an old blog post that is getting some traffic but could be updated to rank higher. They need to 'refresh' the content.

tasks.description: Review the old blog post and identify outdated information or statistics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds several stats from 5 years ago that can be updated.

tasks.description: Research new information and statistics to update the content.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds current data to replace the old information.

tasks.description: Rewrite sections of the post to include the new information and ensure it is still accurate and relevant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the blog post with fresh content.

tasks.description: Update the post's publish date to the current date to signal to search engines that it has been refreshed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent changes the publish date to today.
